 ∙ Mother should have at least 1 serving of low fat, sugar-free yoghurt, curd or milk. 
 ∙ It is also important for a mother to have at least 1 serving of fruits like guava, apple, berries or any citrus

 ∙ Carbohydrate serving in lunch and dinner should be between 2 to 3. Taking heavy meals should be 
avoided.
 ∙ Skipping lunch and dinner and taking meal at irregular time should be avoided.
